# iosxr_macsec (Data Source)

This data source can read the MACSec configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_macsec" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `fips` (Boolean) Enable fips-mode for MACsec
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `shutdown` (Boolean) Disable macsec on all data ports, has no impact on macsec configs
